text: Jedermann (a German word, whose English meaning is "everyone" or "anyone" or "Everyman") may refer to: *Jedermann (play), a 1911 German play by Hugo von Hofmannsthal *Jedermann (film), a 1961 film based on the Hofmannsthal play *Jedermann (Sibelius) by Jean Sibelius, incidental music to the Hofmannsthal play
title: Jedermann
